results.title: Fetal exposure to lisinopril: neonatal manifestations and management.
results.text_hl: In view of this prolonged half-life and the drug's continued suppression of ACE activity and renal function, we recommend institution of early dialysis in @SPECIES_9606 @@@infants@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@ after maternal therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

results.title: Early dialysis in a neonate with intrauterine lisinopril exposure.
results.journal: Arch Dis Child Fetal Neonatal Ed
results.text_hl: Early peritoneal dialysis has not previously been reported for @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@multiorgan failure@@@.

results.title: Long-term monotherapy with lisinopril in renovascular hypertension.
results.text_hl: Serum concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ varied individually and rose in two @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with moderate @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@.

results.title: Pharmacokinetics of lisinopril in hypertensive patients with normal and impaired renal function.
results.text_hl: It is suggested that smaller doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ should be administered to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@severe renal failure@@@.

results.title: The natriuretic effect of nifedipine gastrointestinal therapeutic system remains despite the presence of mild-to-moderate renal failure.
results.text_hl: METHODS: An open-label, randomized, comparative study was conducted to compare the natriuretic capacity of @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ GITS and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in the presence of mild-to-moderate @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ clearance 30-80 ml/min).

citations.NLM: Campo C, Garcia-Vallejo O, Barrios V, Lahera V, Manero M, Esteban E, Rodicio JL, Ruilope LM. The natriuretic effect of nifedipine gastrointestinal therapeutic system remains despite the presence of mild-to-moderate renal failure. J Hypertens. 1997 Dec;15(12 Pt 2):1803-8. PMID: 9488243
